Please fill all fields Password and confrim password not mathced Account created successfully Profile Promotions Profile Tournaments WHAT’S \nLEGION ZONE? HOW TO \nPARTICIPATE TOURNAMENT \nREWARDS
It’s a land of games, you will be flying over hundreds of games and tournaments but once you enter you will be under the legion zone’s rules, follow the footprints of winners and be the upcoming winner Simply put, sign up or log in! All regional online tournament rewards are in USD unless specifically stated in the tournament details. These winnings are payable to the bank account of your choice, however, taxes and additional banking charges may be incurred during this transfer and are subject to your market’s rules and regulations. As such, it is recommended that you prepare your banking details before hand to speed up this process. Terms & Conditions apply.
